title: Batman Arkham Origins MULTi9 Steam-Rip-RG GameWorks
description:
:::::: RG GameWorks PRESENTS ::::::


:::: Batman Arkham Origins MULTi9 Steam-Rip-RG GameWorks ::::


::Information::


Release date : October 24, 2013
Genre: Action / Adventure
Developer: WB Games Montreal / Splash Damage
Publisher: Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment
Platform: PC
Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip]
Language: Russian / English / German / French / Italian / Spanish / Korean / Portuguese / Polish
Sound language: English / German / French / Italian / Spanish / Portuguese
Tablet: Is present [deadmau5 / RELOADED]


::Description::


Batman Arkham Origins the third installment in a series of Batman Arkham. 
It is a prequel and develop for a few years before the events of the previous 
parts. Batman Arkham Origins will provide us with advanced Gotham, where the 
most dangerous criminals and supervillains have not been able to reach the 
summit, and Batman is young and not gain experience


::System Requirements::


OS: 32-bit: Vista, Win 7, Win 8 
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2, 2.8 GHz 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS / AMD Radeon HD 3850 or better 
with 512 MB of VRAM 
DirectX: 9.0c 
Hard Drive Space: 20 GB 
Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection 
Additional Notes: Windows XP and DirectX9.0b and below not supported


::Installation Steps::


1) Download the torrent.

2) Install the game Via Setup.

3) Copy the Contents of NoDVD folder in the Main game Directory.

4) Run the game with BatmanOrigins.bat or a shortcut to the full screen.

5) Play and Support the Developers.
